data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Maine will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maine, United States
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Maine who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Maine, United States.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Maine, United States with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Malay people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Malay people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Malay people is yours.
Spirit, help every believer in Maine, United States be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Maine.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 355,375 believers in the state of Maine the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
